text: Lamellilatirus ceramidus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== Type locality: Barbados, West Indies. Dredged at depths around 150–200 metres. ==References== ==External links== * ceramidus Category:Gastropods described in 1889
title: Lamellilatirus ceramidus
